entry.title: First Light
entry.summary:
I obviously don't do blogging. I end up redoing my web site every couple of years thinking maybe I'll start. This times impetus is my GoDaddy renewal bill. Everybody else seems to be adding features and lowering prices. Not so much here.

It's not like $12 a month is going â€¦
entry.content:
I obviously don't do blogging. I end up redoing my web site every couple of years thinking maybe I'll start. This times impetus is my GoDaddy renewal bill. Everybody else seems to be adding features and lowering prices. Not so much here.

It's not like $12 a month is going to break the bank, but given that I actually have a static IP address, and the infrastructure to serve it, it seem time to bring my web site in from the cold.
